name: Dai Gyakuten Saiban: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Bōken
name_original: Dai Gyakuten Saiban: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Bōken
description:
Dai Gyakuten Saiban: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Bōken is an adventure game developed by Level 5. It was originally released in 2015. Capcom published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Dai Gyakuten Saiban: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Bōken on Nintendo 3DS.
Shintaro Kojima produced the game. It was directed by Shu Takumi. Hiromitsu Maeba and Yasumasa Kitagawa scored the game.
